t7.statements.Statement

  • Packages that use Statement 
    Package Description
    t7  
    t7.statements

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private java.util.Stack<Statement> StatementParser.statements
      The current Statement.
      private java.util.HashSet<Statement> StatementParser.visited
      The visited Statement (used for nesting).

    • Uses of Statement in t7.statements

      Classes in t7.statements that implement Statement 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ClearStatement
      Represents a clear statement.
      class  DelStatement
      Represents a Del statement, it will remove a structure from the list of instantiated structure.
      class  ElseStatement
      Represents an Else statement.
      class  ExportStatement
      An Export Statement, saves the instantiated structures to a given external file.
      class  ExtractStatement
      Represents an Export statement, it will get the structures from eshmun, and add their definition to the workspace.
      class  ForStatement
      Represents a For Loop Statement.
      class  IfStatement
      Represents an If[-Else] Statement.
      class  InstanceStatement
      Represents an Instance Statement.
      class  ListStatement
      A List Statement, lists the already instantiated structure (name + indices).
      class  LoadStatement
      A Load Statement, loads and execute commands from an external file.
      class  SearchStatement
      A search query, searches for already instantiated structures that satisfy the query (REGEX).
      class  StartStatement
      Represents a Start statement, it will start eshmun with the instantiated structures inside.
      class  StructureDefinitionStatement
      Represents a structure definition.
      class  VariableDefinitionStatement
      Represents a Variable Definition Statement.
      class  WhileStatement
      Represents a While Loop Statement.
